# Cracknuts

A library for cracknuts device.  

## Install

```shell
pip install cracknuts
```

## Usage

```python
from cracknuts.cracker.mock_cracker import  MockCracker
mc = MockCracker()
mc.get_name()
```

It will print mock `cracker after` you execute the code above.  

***More details will be available soon.***
